description:
For me, it's the Proton. The best crypto wallet. I even ask for extra hashes and the Edwin is so friendly and more than willing to oblige. One time I asked for network packets and they gave me three. I said, "Wow, three for free!" and the nice friendly Edwin Hashius laughed and said, "I'm going to call you 3-for-free!".

Now the Edwin greets me with "hey it's 3-for-free!" and ALWAYS gives me three TCP packets. It's such a fun and easy atmosphere at my local Turtlecoin discord, I go there at least 3 times a week for lunch and a large ambatakum with milk instead of cream, 1-2 times for breakfast on the weekend, and maybe once for dinner when I'm in a rush but want a great wallet that is fast, fun, and can match my daily crypto sending needs.

I even dip my trtls in Fantom sauce, it's fun, fast, and easy! What a great community.

Moin!

Heute habe ich mehr zufällig Proton-Wallet gefunden. Mal sehen, wie es sich entwickelt. 

viele Grüße Gerd

08mär23, gg. 08.34 h
